thread.title: BRIEF-Tinka Announces Upsized & Oversubscribed Second Tranche Private Placement Financing Of C$2.4 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tinka Announces Upsized & Oversubscribed Second Tranche Private Placement Financing Of C$2.4 Mln
text:
9 minutes ago BRIEF-Tinka Announces Upsized & Oversubscribed Second Tranche Private Placement Financing Of C$2.4 Mln Reuters Staff 
  Tinka Resources Ltd: 
* TINKA ANNOUNCES UPSIZED & OVERSUBSCRIBED SECOND TRANCHE PRIVATE PLACEMENT FINANCING OF C$2.4 MILLION 
* TINKA RESOURCES LTD - INTERNATIONAL FINANCE CORPORATION PROPOSES TO BUY 3.95 MILLION UNITS AT C$0.48 PER UNIT FOR GROSS PROCEEDS TO COMPANY OF C$1.9 MILLION 
* TINKA RESOURCES LTD-PLANS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM SECOND TRANCHE OF PLACEMENT TO FUND EXPLORATION EXPENDITURES AT ITS AYAWILCA PROJECT IN PERU Source text for Eikon:
